channel.title: Clicking an item gives a different item? Rep++
channel.description:
317 DELTA Edge4Pk Source
[b]How do I make it so when I click a casket it gives a player cash?[/b]
Rep++ for help!

item.title: Clicking an item gives a different item? Rep++
item.dc:creator: @JGX JGX
item.description:
@JGX wrote:

[quote=“RiiPiiNFtW, post:2, topic:421235”]ClickItem.jaba?

EDIT: FP. Just noticed it was delta. Look for the ClickItem void or something in the client class?[/quote]

There is a clickingMost.java but that’s for like when I click a teleport in the mage book. I can edit where/what it does in that file. If I do need to use that file idk how to make it so clicking a casket gives cash.

Read full topic
item.source: Clicking an item gives a different item? Rep++
